title: Hands-free tech is still distracting to drivers, study shows
text:
Hands-free tech is still distracting to drivers, study shows 
Published By: Mashable - Today 
Think Siri is the safest way to use your phone in the car? AAA urges you to reconsider.The AAA Foundation for Traffic Safety relea...
